description:
The blue Death Omen Star glows at the edge of the Big Dipper. Gazing up at the night sky, Erika beleives Fei-Yan and Yasaka are watching over her from up there. Just then, an injured Ramon arrives at Kenshiro`s mansion, bringing the jewels with him.
Their father Tesshin has been killed by Kenshin. Upon hearing of his father`s final moments, Kenshiro reminisces about Kenshin.
Since he was a boy, Kenshin is what Kenshiro had to fear most.
Kenshin appears before Kenshiro once again.
Compelled by the destiny of the North Star, Kenshiro and Kenshin begin the fight for their lives now!!
Source: crunchyroll
